scripts.client:start: cd client/my-project && VUE_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:3000 npm run serve
scripts.client:build: cd client/my-project && VUE_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:3000 npm run build
scripts.client:build:on:prod: cd client/my-project && VUE_APP_API_URL=http://jbrjga.com/api npm run build
scripts.docked:full:start: npm run client:build && npm run docked:start
scripts.docked:full:on:prod:start: npm run client:build:on:prod && npm run docked:on:prod:start

scriptsComments.client:start: Start the client in dev HRM mode. Inject address to api server. Match port to what is in docker compose file
scriptsComments.client:build: Compile client into static site. Inject address to api server. Match port to what is in docker compose file
scriptsComments.server:start: start the server in dev HRM mode
scriptsComments.docked:on:prod:start: Start docker containers like and for the prod server. Can use on dev box. Connections: client http://(localhost/domain) port 80.
scriptsComments.docked:full:start: Ditto but first build the static client side.
scriptsComments.docked:full:on:prod:start: Ditto but first build the static client side.
